name: oneclick-fontchanger
description: Let you switch between two fonts via keyboard shortcuts. For convnience,you can use 2 keyboard shortcuts(default Ctrl+Shift+1 and Ctrl+Shift+1). The extension was originally written to solve the problem of quickly changing between Zawgyi-One and Myanmar Unicode. Please feel free to post suggestion and comments.

first_font.description: Change Font Setting to First Font

second_font.description: Change Font Setting to Second Font
